评论概述: Runs small - pocket just for show
评论详情: Definitely order a size or two up, depending on your comfort level. Based on the sizing chart, for my waist, I would be between M and L (normal for me in other clothes). I ordered a 2XL. It fit fine and MAYBE could have gotten away with XL, but it would have been uncomfortable. The pocket doesn't hold much beyond a few bucks and a moist towelette packet. I tried to put dog treats in a sandwich bag and it couldn't expand enough for it. There is a divider inside, so the parts are even smaller than you expect. I prefer low rise, so I rolled the waist band down.
Material was cheap feeling. Very short in person. Wasn’t fully sure I even got what was pictured.
I bought this for a Renaissance fair. I absolutely love it. It is true to the size. It is comfortable. Follow the directions to wash. The material will not last without proper cleaning methods.

Excellent. Very beautiful!

After reading the reviews ( because you gotta with clothes from Amazon) I went with the Medium. It fits perfectly. Very light weight. Its definitely more on the cheaper side for the fabric. But I think it'll be perfect for renaissance. Overall I'm satisfied.

I ordered this skirt for a Renfaire costume.  I originally ordered the 3x.  It fit me, but only just.  So I returned the 3x for a 5x and that fit a lot better. I have no complaints about the skirt, I just simply found something else that I liked better.
No stretch to it at all. Came small. Material feels cheap.

The product was a lighter brown than what was pictured. It fit fine, but I didn't like the overall way my Halloween outfit looked with it. Now that's not on them, but because of that I had returned everything through our local Amazon return booth at Whole Foods, especially since my bf and I didn't go to the event we had planned to go to originally (things came up). They gave me my return for it shortly after I did that but fast forward a couple months later  they charged me again for it because they haven't received the return on time? I'm annoyed because I have no idea why it's not there returned by the same time as the others, especially when I returned another item by the same seller, the same day and same time, and it's been delivered. Same with all of the other items from other sellers. It's frustrating because they charged me for a product I no longer have, bc I returned it. And that money they charged I could use towards moving this month. So I'm frustrated for sure.

评论概述: Trouble with sizing, but actually cute when fits right
评论详情: Amazon suggested I buy a Large, but I typically have to get XL.. so, I decided to order this in a 3XL. It was insanely large. The belt hung low, the skirt hung low.. so I returned it that day, and ordered a 2XL instead. It’s such a better fit!  The belt & pouch is a bit cheesy, and I’m afraid to wash this.. but for the Ren Fair, I think it will look great! I’m pretty short (5’2” and about 160lbs), but I don’t think it will be too much of a problem when I bend over. I’ll likely wear with leggings, and knee-high boots.  **Instead of using an iron, I used a fabric steamer. It worked pretty well!

It doesnt even reach mid thigh and definitely isnt ment for anyone with anything other than a flat butt.  I'm gonna have to do some creative crafting to get this to work because I need it for an event and don't have time to find something different.

The belt is smaller than my hand. Fits right in the palm. To small for my phone by big enough for a card or some cash? The snap on mine is pretty sturdy so it feels like it would be secure. The bag/belt is also removable. It unclips on the left side.

1. Frankly looks a LOT better in the ad, would have expected a skirt double this length if the photo were true to the garment. this skirt is waaaay shorter than the photo would suggest. 2. the belt for the skirt is too short, there is absolutely no hang to the very low quality belt. 3. i got a 2x. i am a size 18 at torrid and i would say this wouldn't fit anyone who wears larger than a size 16. the sizes are at least one size off on labeling and they obviously skimped on fabric in every way possible making the garment really awkward, it doesn't really fit together right after it's on a person. losing weight won't help this because the belt would need to be twice as long as it is to hang as low as the ad depicts. 4. frankly i should return it with a hearty fu for lying about your cheap product, but i am keeping the garment in hopes that it will fit right in a couple months if i continue to lose weight. the quality is not at all what you'd expect for the $40 price. luckily the GLARING design flaws in the garment are pretty easy to fix with an extender, so that's the only reason i'm gonna keep it, (but the company should have really worked harder to advertise honestly and size properly)  tbh tho if you're looking for anything more than a costume piece i would look elsewhere.

Bought this skirt for a ren faire costume. Usually would buy a large, got an extra large, and it was a little snug and fit high on my waist. The material is shiny and the zipper is cheap which is disappointing at this price. This skirt shouldn't be more than $20. If I can find something better I'll return it, but I'm running out of time so may have to wear it. FYI - the pouch on the side won't fit a cell phone and probably wouldn't support anything weighty, but looks ok, it would look better as a real belt rather than attached by a clasp and D-ring.
